title: 3.5. Continuing a Job
intro: Once a Job is finished (it has been stopped) acquisition and the ability to edit or answer Steps in a Template is not unavailable. However, if so wished, a Job can be continued at a later time. This action effectively 're-opens' a Job and starts GPS acquisition, continuing from where it last left off. Additionally, if a Job was created using a Template, the User has the ability to continue answering Steps from where they left off or edit any Step answered already.

blocks.content: Continuing a Job on the web is as simple as running a Template. Below highlights the ways to do this from the Job List. Alternatively a User may like to do so from the Dashboard, in which case the option is equally available in the action menu.
On mobile devices the action to Continue a Job can be found, like all other actions, in the slide-out action menu once a User has selected and tapped on a Job in the list on the Jobs screen.

blocks.caption: Upon continuing an existing Job you will automatically be taken to the 'Runtime' view of the selected Job.
